title: The Winds of Winter: The Battle of Fire (2013)
description:
Ashaya & Aziz go deep into unreleased material from tWoW! A huge battle is about to occur where several POV characters have converged. We break down the relevant spoiler chapters while detailing each of the participants' motivations and expectations for the conflict. Theories, predictions and plenty of action from the battle itself! Published September 24, 2013.
